languages.text: Идира Тласс прожила еще несколько лет после великого похода Вольного Торговца на Эпитафию. Несмотря на короткую жизнь она оставила после себя многочисленные истории и легенды — и о ее приключениях на службе Лорд-капитану, и об ужасных варп-феноменах, источником которых она была.
languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идира добровольно НЕ носит пси-дампер

languages.text: Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand campaign on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested.
languages.original_text: Идира Тласс прожила еще несколько лет после великого похода Вольного Торговца на Эпитафию. Несмотря на короткую жизнь она оставила после себя многочисленные истории и легенды — и о ее приключениях на службе Лорд-капитану, и об ужасных варп-феноменах, источником которых она была.

traits.locale_text: The psyker Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand march on the Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left plenty of legends and stories after her: of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of terrible warp phenomena, the source of which she was, and to one of which she fell prey in the end.

The psyker Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand march on the Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left plenty of legends and stories after her: of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of terrible warp phenomena, the source of which she was, and to one of which she fell prey in the end.

Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand march on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested and that ultimately became her undoing.

Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand march on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested and that ultimately became her undoing.

Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand campaign on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested.

Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand campaign on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested.

languages.text: 在行商浪人取得荒垄碑碣之战的大捷之后，伊迪拉·特拉斯又活了几年。尽管她的生命短暂，但她留下了许多传说和故事，讲述了她为领主舰长服务的冒险经历，以及她所展出的可怕的亚空间异象。
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand campaign on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested.

traits.locale_text: 在行商浪人取得荒垄碑碣之战的大胜后，伊迪拉·特拉斯又活了几年。尽管她的生命短暂，但她留下了许多传说和故事，讲述了她为领主舰长服务的冒险经历，以及她所展出的可怕的亚空间异象。到了最后，她死在了亚空间的异象之中。

languages.text: Idira Tlass lebte nach dem großen Feldzug {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} gegen Epitaph noch mehrere Jahre lang. Trotz ihres kurzen Lebens hinterließ sie viele Legenden und Geschichten von ihren Abenteuern in Diensten des Lord Captains — und von den schrecklichen Warp-Phänomenen, die sie manifestierte.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand campaign on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass lebte nach dem großen Marsch {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} auf Epitaph noch mehrere Jahre lang. Trotz ihres kurzen Lebens hinterließ sie viele Legenden und Geschichten von ihren Abenteuern in Diensten des Lord Captains — und von den schrecklichen Warp-Phänomenen, die sie manifestierte und die letztlich zu ihrem Untergang wurden.

languages.text: Idira Tlass vécut quelques années de plus après la grande campagne {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur Épitaphe. Sa courte vie fit l'objet de bien des légendes et récits portant sur ses aventures au service {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, ainsi que sur les terribles phénomènes du Warp dont elle était victime.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand campaign on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass vécut quelques années de plus après la grande marche {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} sur Épitaphe. Sa courte vie engendra nombre de légendes et de récits portant sur ses aventures au service {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, ainsi que sur les terribles phénomènes du Warp dont elle était victime et qui causèrent sa mort.

languages.text: Idira Tlass vivió durante varios años después de la gran campaña de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente sobre Epitafio. A pesar de lo efímero de su vida, dejó atrás leyendas e historias de sus aventuras al servicio de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, así como de los espantosos fenómenos de la disformidad que manifestaba.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand campaign on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested.

traits.locale_text: Idira Tlass vivió durante varios años después de la gran marcha de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente sobre Epitafio. A pesar de lo efímero de su vida, dejó atrás leyendas e historias de sus aventuras al servicio de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, así como de los espantosos fenómenos de la disformidad que manifestaba y que terminaron por acabar con ella.

languages.text: イディラ・トラスは、自由開拓者のエピタフでの大活躍の後、さらに数年を生きた。その短い生涯でイディラが残した逸話や伝説は、ばロード・キャプテンに従っての冒険や、彼女に発現したおぞましき歪みの現象など、枚挙にいとまがない。
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand campaign on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested.

traits.locale_text: イディラ・トラスは、自由開拓者のエピタフでの大活躍の後、さらに数年を生きた。その短い生涯でイディラが残した逸話や伝説は、ばロード・キャプテンに従っての冒険や、彼女に発現したおぞましき歪みの現象など、枚挙にいとまがない。

languages.text: İdira Tlass, Hür Tacir'in büyük Sinyazıt seferi sonrasında birkaç yıl daha yaşadı. Kısa ömrüne rağmen Lord Kaptan'ın hizmetinde çıktığı maceralardan arkasında sayısız efsaneyle hikâye ve bir de açığa çıkardığı korkunç öteboyut fenomenini bıraktı.
languages.original_text: Idira Tlass lived several more years after the Rogue Trader's grand campaign on Epitaph. Despite her short life, she left behind many legends and tales of her adventures in the Lord Captain's service, and of the terrible warp phenomena that she manifested.

traits.locale_text: İdira Tlass, Hür Tacir'in büyük Kitabe seferinin ardından birkaç yıl daha yaşadı. Kısa ömrüne rağmen Lord Kaptan'ın hizmetinde çıktığı maceralardan arkasında sayısız efsane ve hikâye bıraktı. Bir de açığa çıkardığı korkunç öteboyut fenomenini.

languages.translation_comment: по Q2 Идира добровольно НЕ носит пси-дампер
